DOC.brief_title: GrafixPRIME® Treatment Chronic Diabetic Foot Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes Chronic ulcer ( present ≥4 week , 52 week ) Index ulcer locate malleoli plantar dorsal surface foot Index ulcer extend dermis subcutaneous tissue without evidence expose muscle , tendon , bone joint capsule Adequate circulation foot ( document ABI TBI ) Gangrene present affect foot Index ulcer Charcot deformity Patient receive dialysis Patient 2 previous amputation Patient HbA1c > 12 % random blood sugar > 450 mg/dl Chronic oral steroid use Use IV corticosteroid , immunosuppressive , cytotoxic agent IV antibiotic Another ulcer within 5cm Index ulcer Cellulitis , evidence infection , osteomyelitis
